div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 369 Kutina, between Nis and Leskovac, (589) S. Serbia, Yugoslavia, 1923 Burial: after 355 B.C. (May) Contents: c. 100 AR Damastium: tetradr. Disposition: Vienna 12; Belgrade 2; private coll. Belgrade 1 Münsterberg, MittNumGesWien 15 (1924), pp. 268-9; NZ 1925, p. 29 Saria, Starinar 3 (1924-5), pp. 97-9; NZ 1927, p. 12 Petrović, Numizmatićar (May 1935), pp. 33-7, some illus. May, Damastion, pp. 7- 8, 11, 189, 200, illus. (22)
